Name: Quantum Gravity
About the game: Quantum Gravity is space themed bullet hell action game. The game's main mechanic is inverting gravity to hover through space. It features long-range fights but also melees fighting. Quantum Gravity has a variety of enemies to fight against and also 3 game modes including an infinity game mode. Costumitazion Costumitazion makes up a big part of the game. You can buy and increase your Health, Ammo, and Damage. To customize you have over 15 different skins that you can get for in-game credits Multiplayer Multiplayer mode lets you connect with your friends and play PvP rounds, with a winner, with up to 7 players. The rules are the same and are modified by each client. For you If you are looking for a simple-to-skill game, Quantum Gravity is it. Even though it is a hardcore game it has simple controls and logic that everyone will understand and love to play with in their free time. Infinity Mode The infinity game mode offers an infinite number of levels that increase in difficulty resulting in hardcore game mechanics. The main goal is to survive and win against the enemies. Including boss fights, and close or ranged combat. Gravity Mode The gravity game mode has its special mechanic. While in the other game modes, you can only invert the player's mechanic, in the gravity game mode you can also invert the gravity of the objects around you. Making the gameplay a special experience due to its complexity. Campaign The campaign features many challenging and unique levels, ranging from hostage defense to destroying targets and finding solutions to game puzzles. While having the full equipment of a bullet hell shooter. But the campaign mode never ends every few bigger updates and events the campaign mode will change and suit itself to the occurring event. Making the experience of this game infinitely.
